text: Sarah Caldwell (born March 6, 1924 - died March 23, 2006) was an American opera conductor and a stage director. She sang, performed and was director of opera music. Sarah was born in Missouri, though was raised in Arkansas. She later died due to heart failure in Portland, Maine at 82. Category:People from Missouri Category:Opera Category:1924 births Category:2006 deaths
title: Sarah Caldwell
